responsibilities: Work with the team to prototype and experiment with new AI features
Productionize and launch new AI technology integrations into Notion’s core product
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver product features on time
Stay up-to-date with the latest AI technologies and trends
skills: Expertise in building and prototyping AI products using LLMs, embeddings, and other ML technologies
Understanding of system architecture from UI to data model, familiarity with relational databases like Postgres or MySQL
Experience in building products from the ground up
Ability to ship quality user interfaces using web technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and a modern UI framework like React
Strong problem-solving skills with a holistic approach
analysis:
The job responsibilities include prototyping and experimenting with new AI features, productionizing and launching new AI technology integrations, and staying up-to-date with the latest AI technologies and trends. These responsibilities suggest a focus on AI development and integration, which could involve Generative AI or language models.

The skills required for the job include expertise in building and prototyping AI products using LLMs, embeddings, and other ML technologies. The explicit mention of LLMs (Large Language Models) indicates that the job involves working with language models. Additionally, the requirement for expertise in embeddings, which are often used in conjunction with language models, further supports this conclusion.

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills clearly indicate that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
